summary: A simple retexture for the country flag bikinis which I did not really want in my Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple retexture for some of the bikinis from this amazing mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64853/?]Monno's Bikini
[/url]
You will need Monno's Bikini mod installed first, then choose your texture resolution from mine and extract to your data files folder over top of Monno's.

Monno's Bikinis is one of the best swimwear mods, HDT enabled and all.  But I just didn't like the suits with national flag colors and symbols, I believe these were Mizho's work.  They are well done, just didn't fit in Skyrim.  You may say that my textures are no more lore friendly either, but I made them for me.  All six can be seen in the screenshots.  I tried making some of them with black trim first, but didn't like the look, so did it this way.

Two choices for resolution: 2K optimized (apparently original mod textures were not compressed) and 1K optimized.  Both will save you significant disk space over the originals.

I will not do any alterations or requests for these textures, but it's really easy to do your own, just get the free image editor from paint.NET and you can make your own .dds textures easily.

Enjoy!

-mel
author: Melvinius
